course_title: Spec. Topics in German Studies: Wien und Freiburg 2024
class_notes:
This course is required for all students who will participate in the 2024 Summer Study Abroad Program in Vienna & Freiburg.
 
This course meets bi-weekly on Friday afternoons from 3:00-4:30 on the following days:
January 19
February 2, 16
March 1, 22
April 5, 19
course_description: Taught in English. An interdisciplinary course intended to provide in-depth study of formative elements, influences, and movements in German-speaking culture(s). May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 4082, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 3-4:30p, Instructor: Ruck/Höyng, Status: Open
